document_data.name: ''Elixir of Peerless Focus''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Elixir of peerless focus''''' were magic [[potion]]s that fortified the imbiber's mind.

{{quote|''A spellcaster who cannot maintain their spells is about as useful as a [[chocolate]] kettle.''}}
document_data.Powers: When consumed, ''elixirs of peerless focus'' provided a valuable boon to spellcasters by steeling their minds and improving their focus and concentration on [[spell]]s. As a side effect, the potion made it harder for the imbiber to fall victim to the ''[[charm]]'' spell and immune to ''[[sleep]]ing'' magics and [[poison]]s. The elixir's effects lasted until the imbiber rested for at least eight consecutive hours.
document_data.Creation: ''Elixir of peerless focus'' could be brewed using a sublimate of [[belladonna]] and special type of ash.
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Arron]], a [[hin]] [[druid]] merchant from the [[Emerald Grove]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
